customers.new_customers: close to 200 new sign-ups each month
customers.usage_stats: 5,000 active babies under H-BabyCare; Avixo EMR supports 600+ active clinics (~5% market share in Malaysia).

team.operation_notes: Moved to cost-effective office. Reduced personnel and support roles moved to Southeast Asia. Reduced non-core spend. Improved collections for better cash flow.

product_updates.description: Rebranded home-based vaccination and development assessment service to H-BabyCare™.
product_updates.impact: Excellent adoption; 5,000 babies under care, 200+ new sign-ups per month.

product_updates.description: Avixo EMR platform now supports 600+ active clinics, 5% Malaysia market share.
product_updates.impact: Market leader in Malaysia; key operational scale and product integration driver.

product_updates.description: Released suite of high-quality product videos on website (H-Ward, H-BabyCare™ Protect, H-BabyCare™ Time, H-Pulse Pro).
product_updates.impact: Increased product awareness and website engagement.

events.description: All hospital partners committed to scaling virtual inpatient programs; targeting 400 virtual beds by year-end, 50+ beds annual growth plan.
Raising $900K USD via convertible note to reach free cashflow positivity.

notes: Gross margins improved from 1% to 24% YoY. Expect free cashflow positivity by early 2026. Strategic M&A actively considered; interest from multiple parties and existing/new investors. Actively expanding hospital virtual beds and exploring monetization of existing user base.
